lenders.name: Mambo Kitty
lenders.loan_because:
I hate to see loans being left unfunded on Kiva. If the Field Partners feel that the entrepreneur deserves to be funded, so do I, and so does this team:

http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders

I loan because:

“I think one's feelings waste themselves in words; they ought all to be distilled into actions which bring results.”
                                  - Florence Nightingale

"All the world is full of suffering.
It is also full of overcoming."
                           - Helen Keller

"Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand."
- Mother Teresa
                         
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without finding."             _fsm_

"God may not play dice with the universe, but something strange is going on with the prime numbers." 
                           - Paul Erdos
 
"I'm scared to death of being poor....I grew up poor and will always feel poor inside. It's my pet paranoia."
                    - Cher

"Magister mundi sum!"
                           - Skeletor

"Don't take life too seriously. You'll never get out alive."
- Bugs Bunny

"Life is serious but art is fun.” 
– John Irving 

"I invented the spin."
- Linda Carter

"Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind."
-Dr. Seuss

"Nothing spoils the taste of peanut butter like unrequited love."
- Charlie Brown
lenders.occupational_info: I have dedicated my life to empowering people, who are otherwise underrepresented, to learn how to become successful scientists.

Our varying experiences and backgrounds have taught us that a little generosity can result in wonderful outcomes.

lenders.loan_because: Im able to help

lenders.name: Terri Walsh
lenders.loan_because:
I can finally afford to. I have a little extra, and I understand what it means to work independently. When you work for yourself more than likely, you work harder, and you don't care that you work harder. 

Being an entrepreneur is something you just ARE, deep within your being.....so I give to honor those who didn't try to squash MY spirit. You can do a lot with almost nothing. 

I know that from experience...you need less than you think you do. But you do need a ton of ambition, drive and the WILL. You can't learn, buy or be taught the WILL to create something from nothing. I LOVE that. LOVE LOVE LOVE the WILL to do the impossible.
lenders.occupational_info: I make people exercise to keep them strong and healthy.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can (so can you)

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I couldn't have started or subsequently grown our business without the help of external financing. I'd like to help others do the same.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my business, I want to give the same gift to another woman.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people design their ideal homes by choosing paint color, fabric, architectural finishes and more!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed individuals can change the world. Indeed it's the only thing that ever has." - Margaret Mead

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: I am studying to become a Bar Mitzvah and and part of our tradition is that we're supposed to do a "Mitzvah Project," kind of like a "good deed." I've chosen for my project to start a team at Kiva where my friends and family can help me help other people, and spread the word about this great ay that anyone in the world can do a Mitzvah for people who are working hard to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I think that these kinds of loans are a great way to help other people and I like how the Internet lets you get lots of people involved and watch the results of what can happen when you try to help someone else.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the financial advancement in other countries.

They gave each member of the church an envelope with 5, 10, or 20 dollars in it and encouraged each person, young or old, to affect the lives of others. lenders.name: Boris
lenders.occupational_info: Art Revived sells high quality reproduction oil paintings at an affordable price.  Every painting is handmade by a trained artist and is painted on professional grade canvas.  Why own a print when can you can own a real painting for not much more?  20 by 24 inch paintings start at only $89 per painting, and include free shipping and a 90-day money-back guarantee.  Reproduced paintings include works from artists such as Monet, Van Gogh and Cezanne, and can be custom painted based on customer needs.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It feels wonderful to be able to make a difference in the lives of others!!
lenders.occupational_info: I practice and teach the Meir Schneider Method of Bodywork, which enables people to recover from seemingly incurable conditions such as multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, ALS, spinal injuries, various kinds of paralysis.  By working with the body's ability to heal itself, and assisting in that process, I am able to help people get well who have been thought to be incurable.

lenders.name: MattChin
lenders.loan_because:
He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep, to gain that which he cannot lose. - Jim Elliot

This is how we've come to understand and experience love: Christ sacrificed his life for us. This is why we ought to live sacrificially for our fellow believers, and not just be out for ourselves.
If you see some brother or sister in need and have the means to do something about it but turn a cold shoulder and do nothing, what happens to God's love? It disappears. And you made it disappear.
My dear children, let's not just talk about love; let's practice real love. This is the only way we'll know we're living truly, living in God's reality. - 1 John 3:16-18
